name: Jett Out!
description:
This is Jett. He's a robot and he wants to get out. HELP THE JETT OUT!

Tips and notes:

Recommended to play on 200% zoom in the browser.

Since there are issues with settings in the menu, I decided to put the setting of Jett's speed in HOW TO PLAY.

Sometimes in the future, I'm gonna release a video about this on my YT channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNQgDa0oEl5eOIZUdGgo5mQ/
